HELP 
 Welcome to 1000 Spanish Words. This short guide describes how to use the App to improve your Spanish vocab. 
 The main screen shows the English word or phrase. You can reveal its Spanish equivalent by pressing the SHOW button. To test if you know the reverse translation, just toggle the mode by pressing the ENGLISH-SPANISH button. 
 The review level section of the screen allows you to indicate how well you think you know the word, from zero (poor or no knowledge) up to 4 (perfect).
